item.description: Hey folks - this is last-minute, but I've been bitten by the relay race bug at Hyannis. After chatting with the team about travel distance/logistics/course difficulty, the 20 mile relay at the Black Cat Road Race in Salem, MA this Sunday, March 4 is an attractive option, and one of the last local relay races for several months. Legs are two each of 4.5 and 5.5 miles on a repeated loop course between Salem and Marblehead. Would anyone like to join? http://www.blackcatro...

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Black Cat Road Race 20 Mile Relay, Salem, MA Sunday, March 4
